title: december 6: obscene and absurd
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia goes through the ins and outs of how a groundbreaking novel was put on trial for obscenity: Ulysses by James Joyce. Afterwards, she talks about the release of a favorite modern song. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
